description:
This course is an easy and engaging way to Learn one of the cornerstones of Graphic design- Adobe Photoshop. This series helps you move you around the interface and quickly grow acustomed to adding this tool into your skillset.

All you need is a pc and a few images and within a week you will be able to grasp the fundamentals of Adobe Photoshop. If you are new to this Particular software and need to quickly learn it then this is course for you.
title: An Easy Introduction to Adobe Photoshop
